import React from 'react'; import './LoginScreen.css'; export class LoginScreen extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { currentView: "signUp" } } changeView = (view) => { this.setState({ currentView: view }) } currentView = () => { switch(this.state.currentView) { case "signUp": return (

Sign Up!

Create Account
) break case "logIn": return (

Welcome Back!

Log In
  • this.changeView("PWReset")} href="#">Forgot Password?
) break case "PWReset": return (

Reset Password

Password Reset
  • A reset link will be sent to your inbox!
) default: break } } render() { return (
{this.currentView()}
) } }
